author: sebastiengllmt
title: Cardano Connector (Metamask-like)
description: DeFi DApps require a web wallet to interact with (like Metamask)

assessments.note: Enabling DApps to access a web wallet will allow for more types of applications to be build and may indirectly contribute to increased adoption.
This solution will drive adoption for dApp usage on Cardano.
This proposal does address the challenge, but maybe would be more suitable for the grow up defi ecosystem.

This project will help make utilization of the wallet much simpler and easier through a web-browser-based system (a la Metamask).   To be fair if something like this existed it would simplify the purchasing and buying process through DApps but at this point it isn't critical yet as additional DApps would need to be developed to connect to it.
The proposal is to develop one of THE primary tool needed to enable integration with dapps
Every dApp building on Cardano can make use of this Metamask-like product, this effectively addresses the challenge.
strong proposal by a proven Emurgo team that gave us Yoroi mobile, web browser wallet solution.
This is an essential piece of infrastructure that is being proposed by the dcSpark team. Reducing friction in the wallet experience is essential for broad adoption of crypto and cardano.
This proposal can extend the Yoroi wallet to work with browser based dApps set to go live in the Goguen era.

The team information is sparse and their ideascale profiles do not offer much insight into their track record and abilities. A big plus for the connector between Yoroi and Ergo - links would have been great.
The team has already completed this 'Metamask Connector' for the Yoroi to Ergo dApp integration.
Very little detail given to allow determination of success probability. Please provide more detailed plan with milestones etc. No details to back up claim team has the experience to deliver.
Emurgo is well known and respected, so it is their team.

This team is composed of Emurgo hands and more than capable of getting a project of this scope/scale completed.  Although the proposal is rather slim compared to others, as this will likely be running as an extension through Emurgo is will have strong project management and guidance to develop it.
The teams experience makes them about as heavyweight as you get in the Cardano/Ergo ecosystem
This team has built/upgraded Yoroi wallet and has all of the dev resources needed to implement this solution.
The proposing team has one of the strongest records as a Cardano founding entity.
The dcSpark's team is highly skilled, and has been working with Cardano/Ergo for years. There is little doubt that the team will run into trouble.
The Emurgo team behind this proposal has the dev resources needed to successfully implement this plan

While external factors (e.g. approval of CIP) may delay a proposed timeline, expected difficulties and a breakdown of the requested funds are missing. However, the wallet functionality is self-explanatory and a perceived necessity.
More detailed plan required along with evidence the team has the ability to deliver.
The proposal does not go in detail about how the money are going to be spend. Also, there is no time line. I think this prosal is critical, but need a little bit more of work on it.
A more detailed roadmap and project timeline would be helpful to keep this project more auditable for development and implementation.

While I have no doubt that the team has the capability to deliver, the proposal in and of itself is sparse, slightly vague, has no specific roadmap/timeline for delivery or checkpointing, and provides no rationale for the specific funding amount requested.
The proposal is on the light side but the Emurgo team are well trusted developers and one of the founding Cardano entities.
There is no team more fit to build this solution than the Emurgo devs who delivered Yoroi wallet.

while the proposal doesn't set goals for delivery of a final product it is clear that with this smaller budget that the scope, timeline and budget each align. The team's experience adds confidence that the key project milestones are accurately scoped.
Cardano needs a Metamask like solution for dApps to really take off and there is no team more qualified than the Yoroi builders at Emurgo.

solution: A Chrome extension connector (similar to Metamask) that will enable communication between wallets and DApps.
experience: The team has vast experience with Cardano and already has developed a connector between Yoroi and Ergo.
